name: Patrick Wagner
text: I ate the pizza. It was safely delivered to me curbside. I am glad to eat there. They often sing while they make pizza. I never heard such beautiful voices. I very feel good about their masks and the black man is so nice and great. I would suggest singing at all pizza locations.
